title: At Kitchen Tables, Agonizing Over $1,200 That Won't Be Enough...
description: At Kitchen Tables, Agonizing Over $1,200 That Won't Be Enough... (Top headline, 15th story, link ) Related stories: Coronavirus began months EARLIER and NOT in Wuhan, bombshell UK report claims... More widespread than realized -- Stanford study... AMERICA SIC…
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Melanie Hayes and tens of millions of other Americans are asking the same question as stimulus checks begin to arrive: How do I prioritize spending a one-time relief payment that wont be enough?
